Module com.example.user_interface

Package com.umassboston.camerastreamclient

package com.umassboston.camerastreamclient
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AtsignConnectionManager
    Manages the connection and communication with an @sign using the ATClient library.
    Bubble
    This class creates a bubble that wraps around the text currently displaying in ChatArea
    CameraCaptureRunnable
    Runnable class for capturing frames from a webcam and displaying them in a JavaFX ImageView.
    CameraSender
    This class represents a camera sender that captures frames from a camera and sends them to specified friends using the AtSign library.
    ChatArea
    The ChatArea class is a custom user interface element for a chat area.
    ChatInput
    Represents the chat input component for sending messages.
    FetchOnlineUsers
    The FetchOnlineUsers class is responsible for fetching online users from a specified API endpoint.
    FriendCamera
    Represents a friend's camera view.
    FriendCameraRunnable
    The FriendCameraRunnable class represents a runnable task that continuously receives image data from a friend's camera over a network connection and updates a given ImageView with the received image.
    FriendSelector
    The FriendSelector class represents a UI component for selecting friends and displaying them as bubbles.
    ImageUtils
    Utility class for working with images.
    LoginPage
    The LoginPage class represents a login page for the application.
    LogoutButton
    The LogoutButton class represents a button that allows users to log out of the application.
    Main
    The Main class is the entry point for the Camera Stream Client application.
    MessengerUI
    MessengerUI class is responsible for initializing and controlling the JavaFX user interface for a messenger application.
    SignUpPage
    The SignUpPage class represents the sign-up page of the Camera Stream Client application.
    UserCamera
    The UserCamera class represents a camera feed for a user in the Camera Stream Client application.
    WebcamSelection
    Creates a new instance of the WebcamSelection stage.
